title: Font ID help: website and branding materials
content:
Hello--

Would anyone like to help me ID the serif fonts used on:

1.) the website of Saffron Consulting

2.) The branding materials of King & Spaulding (in the slideshow at top)

Thanks!!

[http://www.saffron-consultants.com/our-work/king-spalding](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015110953/http:/www.saffron-consultants.com/our-work/king-spalding "http://www.saffron-consultants.com/our-work/king-spalding")
author: meanjean

comments.content:
1.) Times  
2.) Woodmark "KING & SPALDING" is close to [Engravers](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015110953/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/urw/engravers/)/ [Sackers Roman](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015110953/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/mti/sackers-roman/)/ [Medium Roman](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015110953/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/mti/medium-roman/). Headlines and body text on materials look like [Plantin](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015110953/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/mti/plantin/).
